ja520:1.1: amataṁ padaṁ → amatapadaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | pamādo → mā mado (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | bharatūsabha → bhāradhūsabha (mr)
ja520:6.2: na hiraññaṁ na dhāniyaṁ → na hiraññanidhāniyā (mr)
ja520:14.2: Sohaṁ → yohaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | maggasmi → maggosmi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja520:27.2: pasupālaṁ vihiṁsati → pasupālañca hiṁsati (bj); pasu phālaṁ vihiṁsati (sya1ed, sya2ed); pasu phālañca hiṁsati (pts-vp-pli1)
ja520:37.4: rājaṁ paramappamādaṁ → rājaṁ paramappavādaṁ (bj); rājaṁ paramappavādiṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); rājā paramappavādiṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
